game.name: Before the Silence
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this turn-based strategy, you will take control of an anti-disinformation department and protect your citizens from terrorist influence. Manage your agents and resources, analyze media, and restore order in different regions of your country.
